column1: I wrote a thread about Tara Reade. I kept hitting the add a tweet button, but it still messed it up. Anyway, I hope that you will read and share it. #wiunion #wipolitics #wiright #Covid_19 #COVID19 #coronavirus #VoteBlue2020
